attributes.action: Increase the 45p tax-free approved mileage allowance to help social care workers
attributes.additional_details: Working in social care we drive many miles a day, we currently get a rate of 45p per mile, with the increase on the price of fuel this has to be increased, many staff are leaving social care for single placement jobs, if this continues the role of social carers will come to an end as we can not afford to go to work. If  this happens the only people who will suffer is the individuals who we care for.
attributes.background: Increase the tax free amount for millage for all social care workers.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase the HMRC Mileage Rate from 45p/mile to 60p/mile
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600966
